page.title: 05Television
page.content: I watch about four hours of television each week from about 4.20 till 6 p.m. and then from 7 o'clock till 10 p.m. On Saturday i watch television in the morning, afternoon and night. I watch more television than the rest of my family. I like soap opera's like "Dallas" and "Crossroads" but my favourite program is "Bewitched". It is about a witch who does magic by twitching her nose but always gets things in a muddle. My family like comedies and thrillers. We have two black and white televisions. One is on a stand in the living room and the other which is a portable in my bedroom. I would like to see more comedy and less sport.
